attributes.action:
Pay an income to the self employed equal to their loss incurred 
by Covid - 19
attributes.additional_details: I have run a small holiday cottage cleaning business since 2002. I employ one person and pay taxes.I do not pay business rates as whilst my business is registered to my home , I only use my home address , landline , a home PC and printer for the business. I am therefore ineligible to receive the cash grants available to help the smallest of businesses as I can't obtain a business rates exemption certificate. We  usually clean 7 cottages a week but that will soon be none due to cancellations
attributes.background: Make grants available for the self employed and freelancers to cover their losses due to Covid - 19 because asking them to take out a bank loan ( if possible ) just kicks the can down the road for those that represent an important part of our economy

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345

you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
